Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Saloon Setting
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic's setting, characters, and initial conflicts in a Western saloon and transitions to the looming threat to Ghost Town.

sub_scenes.title: Comic Introduction and Setting the Scene
sub_scenes.description: These initial arcs establish the comic's title, creators, and the contrast between modern progress and the enduring spirit of the West, setting the stage in a saloon.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Girl from Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Transition to Ghost Town and Airport Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the characters moving from the saloon to Ghost Town and introduces the central conflict of the town's impending demolition for an airport, focusing on the emotional impact on the woman.

narrative_arcs.title: Saloon Exit and Ghost Town Ride
Ghost Town's Past and Airport Future

Major_Arcs.title: Emotional Turmoil and Flashback
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc delves into the emotional reactions to Ghost Town's demolition, focusing on the woman's emotional argument, her observation of the town's demise, and a flashback providing context to her connection with Ghost Town.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Argument and Observation of Demolition
sub_scenes.description: These arcs depict the woman's emotional argument about the Ghost Town's demolition and her direct observation of its destruction, highlighting her deep connection and distress.

narrative_arcs.title: Emotional Argument about Ghost Town's Demolition

sub_scenes.title: Flashback to Ghost Town's Past
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a flashback to Ghost Town in its heyday, showing the woman's past interactions with rough men and providing context for her emotional attachment to the place.

Major_Arcs.title: Family Business and Romantic Tensions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to family dynamics and business discussions related to the airport and horses. It introduces tension between Nan and her father, Nan's emotional distress, and her complex relationship with Cal.

sub_scenes.title: Business and Family Conflict over Airport
sub_scenes.description: These arcs introduce business discussions regarding the airport and juxtapose them with family tensions, particularly between Dad and Nan, over the same issue.

sub_scenes.title: Maternal Comfort and Nan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Nan's emotional recovery through maternal comfort and advice, and her subsequent resolve to seek answers regarding her relationship with Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Maid's Pragmatic View on Love and Action

sub_scenes.title: Horseback Conversation and Relationship Clarification
sub_scenes.description: These arcs depict Nan's pursuit of Cal, their horseback conversation, and initial attempts to clarify their relationship amidst the backdrop of the airport and horse business.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Reconciliation and Understanding

Major_Arcs.title: Snowstorm Crisis and Relief
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to an external crisis – a severe snowstorm – and its impact on the community. It covers the initial assessment of the storm's severity, growing concerns about livestock, and the eventual relief brought by air-dropped fodder.

sub_scenes.title: Assessing the Snowstorm's Danger
sub_scenes.description: These arcs depict the initial assessment of the unprecedented severity of the snowstorm and the growing concerns about its impact on livestock and fodder supplies.

narrative_arcs.title: Mr. Wills and Son Assess the Snowstorm's Severity
Grave Concerns about Livestock and Fodder
Confirmation of the Weather's Unprecedented Danger
Seeking Comfort and Hope Amidst Hardship
Cal's Ominous Reflection on Impending Starvation and Future Uncertainty

sub_scenes.title: Despair, Reassurance, and Aerial Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene encompasses the emotional rollercoaster of despair and fear, followed by reassurance and the eventual arrival of aerial aid, culminating in relief and a moment of romantic reflection amidst the crisis.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Doubt and Cal's Reassurance in the Face of Crisis
Nan's Mother's Plea for Rest and Hope Amidst Overwhelming Odds
Cal's Restless Night and the Unrelenting Snow
Despair and Weariness in the Face of Endless Winter
Sound of an Airplane and a Glimmer of Hope
Excitement and Realization of Fodder Drop
Conversation on Romance Amidst Crisis and Relief

Major_Arcs.title: Cowtown Casanova and Town Dynamics
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new character, Chane Benson, and a new setting in a Western town. It focuses on Chane's actions, the varied reactions of the townspeople, and the emerging conflicts and relationships within this new environment.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Town Reactions
sub_scenes.description: These arcs introduce Chane Benson through a fight scene and showcase the diverse reactions of the townspeople, from admiration to cynicism, setting up his character and town dynamics.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and a Town Scene
Reactions and Judgments of Bystanders on Chane Benson's Actions
Further Reactions and Cynical Commentary on Chane Benson

sub_scenes.title: Family Concerns and Contrasting Male Figures
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a family setting, highlighting a mother's concerns about Jeff's fascination with violence and contrasting the morally upright Clyde Surrett with the more aggressive Chane Benson.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother's Flashback and Concerns About Jeff
Macho Banter and Violent Undertones between Clyde and Chane

sub_scenes.title: Sally, Clyde, and Concerns for Jeff
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Sally's deep concern for Jeff and her interactions with Clyde, highlighting their differing approaches to Jeff's situation and Sally's determination to help him.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Affectionate Agreement and Future Vision
Narrator's Observation of Jeff's Absence and Town Ride
Sally Seeks Advice from Mr. Benson
Mr. Benson's Advice on Violence and Youth

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Article Conflict and Sally's Distress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a newspaper article as a source of conflict, depicting Sally's outrage, Clyde's dismissive reaction as the editor, and Sally's turn to Benson for guidance.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Outrage Over the Article and Initial Talk with Benson
Sally Confronts Clyde, the Editor, About the Article
Clyde's Dismissive Reaction and Sally's Criticism
Sally Seeks Benson's Guidance in Juniper

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Plan and Jeff's Interpretation of the Article
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Benson's plan to use the press and contrasts it with Jeff's interpretation of the article and speculation about Clyde's violent reaction, setting up potential confrontations.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Reaction to the Article and Speculation on Clyde's Response
Considering Dinner with Chane and Reflecting on His Character

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation and Escalating Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with the aftermath of a dinner invitation and quickly escalates into a tense confrontation involving misunderstandings, physical aggression, and a forced kiss, highlighting the volatile dynamics between Sally, Jeff, and Chane.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Dinner Moonlight Conversation and Rising Tension
Immediate Aftermath and Explanations Following the Forced Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Action to Save Clyde and Town Showdown
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the urgent action taken to save Clyde, Jeff's determined ride to town, and the ensuing showdown with Chane, showcasing a shift from personal conflict to action-oriented confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Danger to Clyde and Urgent Need to Go to Town
Jeff's Determined Ride to Save Clyde
Confrontation in Town and Jeff's Intervention
Escalating Tensions and a Challenge to a Fistfight
Anxious Wait in the Clarion Office
Recounting the Night's Events and Newspaper Priority
Praise for Jeff and Clyde's Character and Family Values

Major_Arcs.title: New Boss and Ranch Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc transitions to a new storyline focusing on ranch conflicts, introducing Steve Daley as the new boss and the emerging tensions and threats related to ranch ownership and range wars.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Steve Daley and Initial Tensions
sub_scenes.description: These arcs introduce Steve Daley as the new boss, setting up immediate tensions and conflicts, including a threatening confrontation and initial skepticism towards Steve's capabilities.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the New Boss, Steve Daley
Settling Steve In and Past Doubts

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Troubles and Trip to Town
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the ranch's troubles, including missing cattle and damaged property, and the subsequent trip to town, setting up further conflicts and developments.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Troubles and Range War Fear
Trip to Town and Hank's Orders for Dress Material

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Decision, Romantic Realization, and Steve's Commitment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene revolves around Betsy's decisions regarding Hank's employment, her romantic realization about Steve, and Steve's commitment to her, amidst the backdrop of ranch conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Ranch Conflicts and Steve's Past
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details escalating ranch conflicts, including a confrontation initiated by Old Man Bridges and Hank, and reveals Steve's past and the ambush he faced, justifying his actions and Betsy's evolving perspective.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Hank and Steve's Defense
Justification for Arms and Recall of Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Shift to Force and Steve's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Betsy's shift from seeking peaceful solutions to embracing force, her confrontation with Steve about his violent intentions, and Steve's resolute departure towards Devil's Pass, leading to Betsy's pursuit.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Narration of Pursuit and Arrival at Devil's Pass

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Romantic Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes the violent confrontation at Devil's Pass where Steve is captured, juxtaposed with a romantic interlude where Betsy and Steve reassure each other of their love amidst the danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Capture at Devil's Pass

Major_Arcs.title: Complex Relationships and Deception
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces new complex relationships and deceptive plots involving Carrie, Fred, and Dave, focusing on romantic manipulations, business deals, and emotional betrayals.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Stern Warning and Curley's Troubled State
sub_scenes.description: These arcs introduce Betsy in a stern role, warning Dave, and then shift to Curley's troubled behavior and concerns about external ranch threats, setting a tone of unease and foreshadowing conflicts.

narrative_arcs.title: Curley's Troubled Behavior and Ranch Concerns

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Violent Escalation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the escalating fence dispute, from initial discussions and confrontation to Curley's violent intervention and the clear rejection of Dave and Betsy's group.

sub_scenes.title: Reconciliation, Differing Opinions, and Ominous Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes Carrie and Dave's reconciliation, differing opinions about Fred Gordon, a decision to avoid conflict, and an ominous encounter with Fred, creating a mix of personal and relational tensions.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion of Fred and Differing Opinions
Agreement to Avoid Conflict and Carrie's Reflection
Encounter with Fred Gordon and Ominous Question

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation, Love Confession, and Marriage Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features confrontations and emotional revelations, leading to a love confession and a marriage proposal, showcasing rapid shifts in relationships and emotions.

narrative_arcs.title: Miss Bronson and Mr. Gordon's Conversation about Dave's Feelings

sub_scenes.title: Carlton Contract Deception and Fury
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Fred's deceptive plan regarding the Carlton contract, leading to Carrie's furious confrontation and physical reaction, marking a dramatic turning point in their relationship.

sub_scenes.title: Carlton's Office Confrontation and Emotional Fallout
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Carrie's forceful confrontation in Carlton's office, followed by the emotional aftermath where she seeks comfort from her father and appears to concede to Fred, showing a complex resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Assertions in Carlton's Office

sub_scenes.title: Separation and Misunderstanding Clarification
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's reflection and separation from Fred, followed by an encounter with Dave where misunderstandings are clarified, leading to a complex emotional exchange and a memory flashback.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Past Pride and Present Hurt with Fred
Unexpected Encounter and Cold Dismissal in Town
Concern and Defiance in the Buckboard

sub_scenes.title: Illness, Confession, and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene encompasses Carrie's illness, Dave's confession of Fred's deception, and the subsequent romantic climax where Carrie and Fred reconcile and express their love, resolving the central romantic conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Father and Dave's Clarification & Carlton's Interjection
Dave's Confession and Carrie's Ride to Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Chris's Escape and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a separate storyline focusing on Chris and Dirk's escape, their pursuit by the Marshal, and the ultimate betrayal and romantic resolution for Chris.

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Plea, Confession, and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dirk's urgent plea to Chris, followed by a doctor's examination, setting up the context for their escape plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Late Night Visitor and Urgent Plea
Worried Kin and a Father's Decision
Plea for Mercy and a Change of Plans
Duty vs. Love and a Hint of Escape
Decision to Act and Arming Dirk

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Pursuit, and Gunfight Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dirk and Chris's escape attempt, the immediate pursuit by the Marshal, the ensuing gunfight, and its immediate aftermath, escalating the action and danger.

sub_scenes.title: Recovery, Reconciliation, and Wedding Climax
sub_scenes.description: This final sub-scene focuses on Rance's recovery, his reconciliation with Chris, their marriage proposal, and the wedding ceremony itself, resolving the romantic storyline and bringing the narrative to a close.
